body_html:
Actually, you might try to create the dummy variable with, e.g. Variable() and requires_grad=True

I'm using 0.4.1 so it shouldn't matter. Also it works for some of my other networks. It just doesn't work for some for some reason.

body:
> Actually, you might try to create the dummy variable with, e.g. `Variable()` and `requires_grad=True`

I'm using 0.4.1 so it shouldn't matter. Also it works for some of my other networks. It just doesn't work for some for some reason.
